mean_cn: n. 视频，录像；  v. 制作……的录像；  n. 录像带
mean_en: a short film or recording of an event, made using digital technology and viewed on a computer, especially over the Internet; a short film made by a pop or rock band to be shown with a song when it is played on television or online
sentence: His job was to record the show on video.
sentence_trans: 他的工作是制作演出的录像。
